job.title: Java Software Engineer-Web Services-Jr Level
job.description: Purpose of JobltbrgtltbrgtWe are currently seeking talented Java Software Engineers Jr Level for our Phoenix AZ location for teams inside our Chief Administrative Office groupltbrgtltbrgtUSAA Java Software Engineers create and maintain APIs for our business software applications that our members use Done well many may never realize or appreciate how critical these APIs are or how weve made them simpler Faster Safer Yet they help make our members lives better Its a great challenge and responsibilityltbrgtltbrgtHere you will invent Youll design and test Youll take risks Youll create new technology but the impact youll make on our members will be far more significantltbrgtltbrgtJob RequirementsltbrgtltbrgtAs a Java Engineer you are expected to be able to function in a fastpaced environment driving innovation through rapid prototyping and iterative development ensuring quality is built into all solutions leveraging TDD Your responsibilities will require you to be knowledgeable in API development You will be a part of teams of developers guiding on engineering and architecture best practices as well as demonstrate the ability to partner and engage with other engineers and architects You will work closely with business clients and UI designers to analyze user requirements code applications and customize andor integrate commercial software packages for both internal employees and external memberfacing applications across multiple platformsltbrgtltbrgtAs a Java Engineer it will be your responsibility to maintain code integrity and qualityltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtAbout USAAltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtUSAA knows what it means to serve We facilitate the financial security of millions of US military members and their families This singular mission requires a dedication to innovative thinking at every levelltbrgtltbrgtUSAA Careers  World Class Benefits 31 secondsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtPrimary ResponsibilitiesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtWith limited guidance performs defect correction analysis design code on less complex issues andor codes applications of medium complexityltligtltligtWith guidance begins to install customize and integrate commercial software packagesltligtltligtWorks with more tenured peers to gain understanding of systems while conducting root cause analysis of issues reviewing new and existing code andor performing unit testingltligtltligtWorks with experienced team members to conduct root cause analysis of issues review new and existing code andor perform unit testingltligtltligtLearns to create system documentationplay books and attends requirements design and code reviewsltligtltligtReceives work packages from manager andor delegatesltligtltligtUnderstands and assists in gathering and analyzing customer requirements and may respond to outages following the appropriate processesltligtltligtPartners with experienced team members to develop accurate estimates on work packages May begin to identify issues that impact availabilityltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtMinimum RequirementsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtBachelors degree in related field of study OR Certification from an approved technical field of study OR 4 additional years of IT experience beyond the minimum required in lieu of a degree ltligtltligtAND 2 years of software engineeringdevelopment experience utilizing Java with experience working with RESTful Web ServiceltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtPreferred Experienceltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt2 years in REST frameworks with focus on API developmentltligtltligt1 years in AGILE methodologyltligtltligt1 years experience working with JavaScriptltligtltligt1 years experience integrating with backend services like JMS J2C ORM frameworks Hibernate JPA JDO etc JDBCltligtltligtAbility to implement container based APIs using a container frameworks OpenShift Docker or KubernetesltligtltligtRelational Database design and optimization with Oracle DB2 MySQL PostgressltligtltligtFamiliar with Gradle GIT GitHUB GITLab etc around continuous integration and continuous delivery infrastructureltligtltligtExperience testing in REST servicesltligtltligtExperience in design and develop automated test frameworkltbrgtltligtltulgtThe above description reflects the details considered necessary to describe the principal functions of the job and should not be construed as a detailed description of all the work requirements that may be performed in the jobltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtCompensation ltstronggtUSAA has an effective process for assessing market data and establishing ranges to ensure we remain competitive You are paid within the salary range based on your experience and market position The salary range for this position is 6630000  11950000  this does not include geographic differential it may be applied based on your work locationltbrgtltbrgtEmployees may be eligible for pay incentives based on overall corporate and individual performance or at the discretion of the USAA Board of DirectorsltbrgtltulgtltligtGeographical Differential Geographic pay differential is additional pay provided to eligible employees working in locations where market pay levels are above the national averageltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtShift premiumltstronggt will be addressed on an individualbasis for applicable roles that are consistently scheduled for noncore hoursltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtBenefits ltstronggtAt USAA our employees enjoy bestinclass benefits to support their physical financial and emotional wellness These benefits include comprehensive medical dental and vision plans 401k pension life insurance parental benefits adoption assistance paid time off program with paid holidays plus 16 paid volunteer hours and various wellness programs Additionally our career path planning and continuing education assists employees with their professional goalsltbrgtltbrgtPlease click on the link below for more detailsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtUSAA Total RewardsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtRelocationltstronggt assistance is ltstronggtnotltstronggt ltstronggtavailableltstronggt for this position
